Koo::Common::Common::LostConnectionDialog Class Reference

The LostConnectionDialog class shows the error dialog used when connection with the server has been lost. More...

List of all members.

Detailed Description

The LostConnectionDialog class shows the error dialog used when connection with the server has been lost.

The show a counter which is decreased every seconds and waits for 10 seconds before retrying.

See also:
lostConnectionError()
